```{r, eval=FALSE}
require(rworldmap)
require(dplyr)

```

```{r}
newmap <- getMap(resolution = "low")

buoyLocations <-dget("buoyLocsAndYears.txt")
finalStorms <- dget("finalStorms.txt")

stormsToMapNorthA<-finalStorms %>% select(Basin, Serial_Num, Latitude, Longitude) %>%
  mutate(BasinChar = as.character(Basin))%>% filter(BasinChar == " NA") %>%
  mutate(Serial_NumChar = as.character(Serial_Num)) %>% 
  filter(Serial_NumChar %in% names(which(table(Serial_NumChar) > 1)))

plot(newmap,xlim = c(-100,-20), ylim = c(0,55),  asp=1)
points(buoyLocations$Longitude, buoyLocations$Latitude, col = "red", cex = 0.6)
points(stormsToMapNorthA$Longitude, stormsToMapNorthA$Latitude, col= "blue", cex =0.6, pch =16)

#which serial nums have less than 2 rows
names(which(table(stormsToMapNorthA$Serial_NumChar) < 2))
```
